Description: Join our team at voestalpine Turnout Technology Egypt as a Quality & HSEE Manager to ensure the highest standards of quality and health, safety, environment, and energy (HSEE) compliance of turnout manufacturing within our organization. As a key member of our management team, you will be responsible for overseeing quality control processes, implementing HSEE policies, conducting audits, and driving continuous improvement initiatives. If you have a strong background in quality management and a passion for ensuring workplace safety and environmental sustainability, we invite you to apply and contribute to our commitment to excellence. Previous experience in the field of turnout manufacturing or any related field is well appreciated.Starting Date: September/October 2023Skills
Skills:
Develop, implement, and oversee quality control procedures to maintain product/service excellence.
Design and enforce health, safety, environment, and energy (HSEE) policies in alignment with industry regulations.
Conduct regular audits and inspections to ensure compliance with quality standards and HSEE protocols.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive continuous improvement initiatives and resolve quality/HSEE issues.
Provide training and mentorship to employees on quality/HSEE practices, fostering a culture of safety and excellence.
